title: Actress Helen Hunt rushed to hospital after horror car crash flips her vehicle
text:

Academy Award-winning actress Helen Hunt was rushed to hospital after a violent car crash in LA which flipped over the SUV she was riding in.

The 56-year-old actress was the only passenger, when another car clipped Helen's and flipped it on to its side.

Helen, who rose to fame in the TV show Mad About You and also starred in What Women Want, The Sessions, and Castaway, was immediately rushed to hospital.

(Image: WireImage)

TMZ obtained a video of the crash, in which it looks like Helen's SUV has a clear path across the intersection, but gets clipped at the last minute.

After complaining of pain, Helen was taken to hospital in a stable condition, and left a few hours later.

Her rep told TMZ Helen was shaken but did not suffer major injuries.

(Image: REX)

The condition of the driver of her car or of the other car is not yet known.

No one has been cited for the crash and it's reported drugs or alcohol are not thought to have been to blame.

Helen has joked on Twitter about regularly being mistaken for fellow actress Jodie Foster.

She shared a Twitter photo of her drink that she'd had made by the barista at Starbucks and which was labelled 'Jody'.

(Image: Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP)

"Ordered my drink @Starbucks Asked the barista if she wanted my name. She winked and said ‘We gotcha' #JodieFoster," Helen tweeted.

During an appearance on The Late Show in 1994, Helen revealed how “a lot of people” tell her that she looks like Jodie Foster, who is also 56.

She told host David Letterman : "Last Thanksgiving it was my job to buy the Thanksgiving turkey, and I was in the supermarket and I got to the checkout counter with my 100-pound turkey, or something, and the guy is checking me out and says, 'You're Jodie Foster'.

(Image: Splash)

"And I said, 'I'm actually not, thank you.' 'No you are, I know you're Jodie Foster.' 'I'm begging you, I'm not, I'm really not'.

Helen had to show him her ID before he would believe her and then he withdrew his offer to give her the turkey for free.

She explained: "No more free bird at all. He wanted to give me a free turkey, and then I'm not Jodie Foster, so pay up."
description: Helen Hunt was involved in a car crash that flipped the car she was riding in, and she was rushed to hospital
